Package com.ainq.fhir.utils

Class PathUtils

java.lang.Object
com.ainq.fhir.utils.PathUtils
public class PathUtils extends Object
Parse a path from a FHIR Object and return the object. Paths in this class use the Restricted FHIRPath syntax with a few minor simplifications: extension('extension-url') can be written without the full url when the extension is a FHIR standard extension (comes from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/), or from FHIR US Core (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/). Also, the quotes in the extension name aren't necessary. Also, one can use the extension short name directly: Patient.us-core-race works as a path expression.
Author:
Audacious Inquiry
See Also:
